steam_is_user_logged_on: This function will return <tt>true</tt> if the Steam client currently has a live connection to the Steam servers. If it returns <tt>false</tt>, it means there is no active connection due to either a networking issue on the local machine, or the Steam server being down or busy.
The above code will check to see if the user is logged onto the Steam server and if it stores the user ID in a global variable.
